    type='BEVFormer',

        norm_eval=True,
        style='pytorch'),
    img_neck=dict(
        type='FPN',

    pts_bbox_head=dict(
        type='BEVFormerHead',

        with_box_refine=True,
        as_two_stage=False,
        transformer=dict(

            rotate_prev_bev=True,
            use_shift=True,
            use_can_bus=True,
            embed_dims=256,

                    operation_order=('self_attn', 'norm', 'cross_attn', 'norm',

            decoder=dict(
                type='DetectionTransformerDecoder',

        loss_cls=dict(
